item.source: Steve Jobs to be deposed in iTunes antitrust suit

item.title: Steve Jobs to be deposed in iTunes antitrust suit
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:14, topic:387617”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=483413.msg3542977#msg3542977 date=1300999193]

Awesome!

I’m guessing you don’t even own an iPod.

Of course not, why would I pay such a ridiculous price for a media player that is so locked down that they are in the middle of an antitrust suit?
[/quote]There is but one reason to buy an iPod really. It gives a fuckton of storage space for a much lower price than the competitors with equal storage capacity. I wouldn’t buy one though, the audio hardware is way too inferior for me to bother.

Last time I bought a media player, it was a touch screen RCA thing with something like 5gb of storage and support for any size micro-sd card if you wanted more, and it was on sale for $15 at the local drug store, so it seems like Apple loses at that one too.[/quote]Or not. That is little to none storage, the biggest iPods (which i were referring to), are at 160GB.

Read full topic
item.source: Steve Jobs to be deposed in iTunes antitrust suit

item.title: Steve Jobs to be deposed in iTunes antitrust suit
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:11, topic:387617”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=483413.msg3542832#msg3542832 date=1300991616]

Awesome!

I’m guessing you don’t even own an iPod.

Of course not, why would I pay such a ridiculous price for a media player that is so locked down that they are in the middle of an antitrust suit?
[/quote]There is but one reason to buy an iPod really. It gives a fuckton of storage space for a much lower price than the competitors with equal storage capacity. I wouldn’t buy one though, the audio hardware is way too inferior for me to bother.[/quote]

Last time I bought a media player, it was a touch screen RCA thing with something like 5gb of storage and support for any size micro-sd card if you wanted more, and it was on sale for $15 at the local drug store, so it seems like Apple loses at that one too.

Read full topic

I use rockbox on my older ipod for the longest time and loved it.

Awesome!
[/quote]
I’m guessing you don’t even own an iPod.[/quote]

I own an iPod, and I’m glad they sue the shit out of Apple if they try to pull out this shit. I don’t use iTunes though, it sucks balls.

item.title: Steve Jobs to be deposed in iTunes antitrust suit
item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

The Sydney Morning Herald – 23 Mar 11

Steve Jobs to be deposed in iTunes antitrust suit

A federal judge has cleared the way for Apple's ailing leader Steve Jobs to be deposed in a class-action lawsuit charging the iPod maker turned iTunes into a digital music monopoly.

LOL

Read full topic
